subject: Tennis
Assaults
Sentences (Criminal)
Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: John Tomic, the father and coach of the Australian tennis player Bernard Tomic, was found guilty by a court in Madrid of head-butting his son’s former training partner.
snippet: John Tomic, the father and coach of the Australian tennis player Bernard Tomic, was found guilty by a court in Madrid of head-butting his son’s former training partner.
